properties.areaDesc: Butte; Wyoming Black Hills; Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Northeastern Crook
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 1:35PM MST until January 10 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
A narrow band of moderate snow will develop across northeast
Wyoming into west central South Dakota tonight. The snow will
quickly end Friday morning.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches
with locally higher amounts along the northern through
northeast slopes of the Black Hills.

* WHERE...Portions of northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming
and northwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST FRIDAY
